item.text: Now Naomi had a relative on her husband’s side of the family named Boaz. He was a wealthy, prominent man from the clan of Elimelech.

One day <st data-num="07327" class="">Ruth</st> the <st data-num="04125" class="">Moabite</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="05281" class="">Naomi</st>, “<st data-num="04994" class="">Let</st> me <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st><n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="07704" class="">fields</st> so I can <st data-num="03950" class="">gather</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="07641" class="">grain</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">behind</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whoever</st> <st data-num="04672 02580 05869">permits me</st> to do so.”<n id="3" /> Naomi<n id="4" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “You may <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st>, my <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st>.”
So Ruth went and gathered grain in the fields behind the harvesters. Now she just happened to end up in the portion of the field belonging to Boaz, who was from the clan of Elimelech.
Now at that very moment, Boaz arrived from Bethlehem and greeted the harvesters, “May the Lord be with you!” They replied, “May the Lord bless you!”

<st data-num="01162" class="">Boaz</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">asked</st><n id="1" /> his <st data-num="05288" class="">servant</st><n id="2" /> in <st data-num="05324" class="">charge</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="07114" class="">harvesters</st>, “To <st data-num="04310" class="">whom</st> does <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="05291" class="">young woman</st> belong?”<n id="3" />

The <st data-num="05288" class="">servant</st> in <st data-num="05324" class="">charge</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="07114" class="">harvesters</st> <st data-num="06030 0559">replied</st>, “<st data-num="01931" class="">She’s</st> the <st data-num="05291" class="">young</st> <st data-num="04125" class="">Moabite</st> <st data-num="05291" class="">woman</st> who <st data-num="07725" class="">came back</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> <st data-num="05281" class="">Naomi</st> from the <st data-num="07704" class="">region</st> of <st data-num="04124" class="">Moab</st>.

She asked, ‘May I follow the harvesters and gather grain among the bundles?’ Since she arrived she has been working hard from this morning until now—except for sitting in the resting hut a short time.”
So Boaz said to Ruth, “Listen carefully, my dear! Do not leave to gather grain in another field. You need not go beyond the limits of this field. You may go along beside my female workers.

Take note of the field where the men are harvesting and follow behind with the female workers. I will tell the men to leave you alone. When you are thirsty, you may go to the water jars and drink some of the water the servants draw.”
Ruth knelt before him with her forehead to the ground and said to him, “Why are you so kind and so attentive to me, even though I am a foreigner?”

<st data-num="01162" class="">Boaz</st> <st data-num="06030 0559">replied</st> to her,<n id="1" /> “I have been <st data-num="05046" class="">given</st> a <st data-num="05046" class="">full report</st> of<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> you have <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">for</st> your <st data-num="02545" class="">mother-in-law</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">following</st> the <st data-num="04194" class="">death</st> of your <st data-num="0376" class="">husband</st>—how you <st data-num="05800" class="">left</st><n id="3" /> your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> and your <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st>, as well as your <st data-num="0776 04138">homeland</st>, and <st data-num="01980" class="">came</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> live among <st data-num="05971 0834">people</st> you did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="08543 08032">previously</st>.<n id="4" />
May the Lord reward your efforts! May your acts of kindness be repaid fully by the Lord God of Israel, from whom you have sought protection.”
She said, “You really are being kind to me, sir, for you have reassured and encouraged me, your servant, even though I will never be like one of your servants.”

Later during the mealtime Boaz said to her, “Come here and have some food! Dip your bread in the vinegar.” So she sat down beside the harvesters. Then he handed her some roasted grain. She ate until she was full and saved the rest.

When she <st data-num="06965" class="">got up</st> to <st data-num="03950" class="">gather grain</st>, <st data-num="01162" class="">Boaz</st> <st data-num="06680 0559">told</st><n id="1" /> his <st data-num="05288" class="">male servants</st>, “Let her <st data-num="03950" class="">gather grain</st> <st data-num="01571" class="">even</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">among</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="06016" class="">bundles</st>. <st data-num="03808" class="">Don’t</st> <st data-num="03637" class="">chase</st> her <st data-num="03637" class="">off</st>!<n id="3" />

<st data-num="01571 07997">Make sure</st> you <st data-num="07997" class="">pull out</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04480 06653">ears of grain</st> for her and <st data-num="05800" class="">drop</st> them so she can <st data-num="03950" class="">gather</st> them <st data-num="03950" class="">up</st>. <st data-num="03808" class="">Don’t</st> <st data-num="01605" class="">tell</st> her <st data-num="01605" class="">not to</st>!”<n id="2" />
So she gathered grain in the field until evening. When she threshed what she had gathered, it came to about 30 pounds of barley.
She carried it back to town, and her mother-in-law saw how much grain she had gathered. Then Ruth gave her the roasted grain she had saved from mealtime.

Her <st data-num="02545" class="">mother-in-law</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">asked</st> her,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="0375" class="">Where</st> did you <st data-num="03950" class="">gather grain</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">today</st>? <st data-num="0575" class="">Where</st> did you <st data-num="06213" class="">work</st>? May the one who <st data-num="05234" class="">took notice of</st> you <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="01288" class="">rewarded</st>!”<n id="2" /> So Ruth<n id="3" /> <st data-num="05046" class="">told</st> her <st data-num="02545" class="">mother-in-law</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> she had <st data-num="06213" class="">worked</st>. She <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “The <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> of the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> I <st data-num="06213" class="">worked</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">today</st> is <st data-num="01162" class="">Boaz</st>.”

Naomi said to her daughter-in-law, “May he be rewarded by the Lord because he has shown loyalty to the living on behalf of the dead!” Then Naomi said to her, “This man is a close relative of ours; he is our guardian.”

<st data-num="07327" class="">Ruth</st> the <st data-num="04125" class="">Moabite</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “He <st data-num="01571 03588">even</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559 0413">told</st> me, ‘You may <st data-num="01692" class="">go along</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">beside</st> my <st data-num="05288" class="">servants</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05704 0518">until</st> they have <st data-num="03615" class="">finished</st> gathering <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> my <st data-num="07105" class="">harvest</st>!’”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="05281" class="">Naomi</st> then <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> her <st data-num="03618" class="">daughter-in-law</st> <st data-num="07327" class="">Ruth</st>, “It is <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st>, my <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> you should <st data-num="03318" class="">go out</st> to work <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> his <st data-num="05291" class="">female servants</st>.<n id="1" /> That way you will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="06293" class="">harmed</st>, which could happen in <st data-num="0312" class="">another</st> <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st>.”<n id="2" />
So Ruth worked beside Boaz’s female servants, gathering grain until the end of the barley harvest as well as the wheat harvest. After that she stayed home with her mother-in-law.
